verses.verse: {A special Davidic Psalm. {16:T Heb. miktam}} {Trust in the Face of Death} d Keep me safe, God, for I take refuge in you.
I told the LORD , "You are my master, {Heb. Adonai} I have nothing good apart from you."
As for the saints that are in the land, they are noble, and all my delight is in them.

Those who hurry after another god {The Heb. lacks god} will have many sorrows; I will not present {Lit. pour out} their drink offerings of blood, nor will my lips speak {Lit. lift up on my lips} their names.
The LORD is my inheritance and my cup; you support my lot.
The boundary lines have fallen in pleasant places for me; truly, I have a beautiful heritage.
I will bless the LORD who has counseled me; indeed, my conscience instructs {Lit. thoughts instruct} me during the night.
I have set the LORD before me continually; because he stands at my right hand, I will stand firm. {Lit. not be shaken}
Therefore, my heart is glad, my whole being {Lit. glory} rejoices, and my body will dwell securely.

For you will not leave my soul in Sheol, {I. e. the realm of the dead} you will not allow your holy one to experience corruption. {Lit. to see the Pit ; i. e. the realm of punishment in the afterlife}
You cause me to know the path of life; in your presence is joyful abundance, at your right hand there are pleasures forever.
